#Usage of GWTChismes library.

 * Download last version of the library: gwtchimes-x.x.x.jar and include it in your classpath.
 * Configure your module file: 
{{{
<module>

  <inherits name="com.google.code.p.gwtchismes.GWTChismes"/>

  <entry-point class="[...]"/>

  <!-- Optional: Include the locales you want in your application -->  
  <extend-property name="locale" values="es"/>
  <extend-property name="locale" values="en"/>
  <extend-property name="locale" values="ja"/>
   
</module>
}}}
  * Use the widget in your application
